summary: Sodium chloride, also known as edible salt, is a common chemical compound made up of equal parts sodium and chlorine. It's the mineral halite, often transparent or translucent, and is brittle and hygroscopic. We use it daily as a seasoning and food preservative. Industrially, it's crucial for getting sodium and chlorine for making other chemicals. It's also used to melt ice on roads in cold weather.
title: Sodium chloride
